text: Ahn Ji-young (born September 14, 1995) is a South Korean singer and songwriter. She is the main vocalist and only remaining member of South Korean indie band Bolbbalgan4. In 2014, she was featured on the television program Superstar K 6, and debuted as a member of Bolbbalgan4 along with Woo Ji-yoon in 2016. After Woo left the band in early 2020, it was announced that Ahn would continue to promote under the duo name. ==Discography== == Filmography == === Television shows === {|class="wikitable" !style="width: 5%|Year !style="width: 20%|Title !style="width: 10%|Network !style="width: 10%|Role !style="width: 30%|Notes/ Ref. |- |2014 |Superstar K 6 |Mnet |Contestant |with Woo Ji-yoon |- |2016 |King of Mask Singer |MBC |Contestant | |- |} ==Awards and nominations== == References == Category:Living people Category:1995 births Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:South Korean female pop singers Category:King of Mask Singer contestants Category:Sungshin Women's University alumni
